name: The New Dawn: Android
description:
This Game is not finished it is dedicated with much love.

Thank you for supporting me and trusting me.

Maria I LOVE YOU SO MUCH ...

Especially to my parents who swallowed me in this world, Donaldo and Teresa, we love him and my whole family.

Thank you and goodbye!

Check out my Patreon!
